title: Site-wide: Fix critical architecture issues
Prompt Library: Add auto-save and unsaved-changes warning
description: Currently manual save only with no warning on close. Add debounced auto-save to localStorage and beforeunload warning for unsaved changes.

title: Prompt Library: Fix delete - add confirmation and undo
description: Delete is immediate with no undo or confirmation. Deleting all prompts leaves stale localStorage data that reloads on next visit.

title: Prompt Library: Fix sharing - URLs break past 2KB
description: Sharing base64-encodes entire prompts into URLs. Breaks at ~2048 chars. Need server-side share links or compressed encoding.

title: Agent Spec Builder: Decompose 927-line monolith
description: Main page.tsx is 927 lines handling everything. Break into focused components: SpecForm, SectionEditor, QualityMeter, EvalRubricBuilder, ExportPanel, PromptPacks, PresetGallery.
close_reason: Stale duplicate deleted, auto-save added, examples fixed

title: Agent Spec Builder: Add auto-save
description: No auto-save - users lose all work on page close. Add debounced localStorage auto-save with beforeunload warning.
close_reason: Completed: added debounced auto-save to localStorage, beforeunload warning, and Saving/Saved indicator

title: Agent Spec Builder: Fix broken Examples page
description: Renders in light mode, uses invalid Tailwind class rounded-none-lg, links point to root instead of /e/agent-spec-builder.
close_reason: Completed: fixed dark theme, removed invalid classes, fixed links, matched design system

title: The Blob: Visual and interaction polish
description: Creature behaviors too subtle, no audio, missing mobile touch fixes. Key upgrades: additive glow blending, ambient Web Audio, touch-action manipulation, devicePixelRatio handling.

title: The Blob: Add additive glow blending
description: Use globalCompositeOperation lighter for bioluminescence glow effect. Single biggest visual upgrade.

title: The Blob: Add ambient Web Audio
description: Generative ambient audio for soothing vibes. Significant immersion upgrade for an experience built around calm.

title: The Blob: Fix mobile touch issues
description: Missing touch-action: manipulation (causes double-tap zoom), user-select: none, devicePixelRatio handling, prefers-reduced-motion support.

title: Remove nested html/body tags from prompt-library and agent-spec-builder layouts
description: Both experiment sub-apps render their own html and body in nested layouts, breaking font/style inheritance from root layout. Replace with fragment or div wrappers. Delete their local globals.css files.

title: Site: Dynamic import heavy dependencies
description: Dynamically import react-markdown, remark-gfm, jszip - only load when needed. Saves ~100KB from initial bundles.

title: Site: Add accessibility foundations
description: color-scheme dark on html, skip-to-content link, focus-visible styles, aria-live on toasts/realtime, proper ARIA on dropdown menus. Replace alert/confirm with custom modals.

title: Site: Replace in-memory rate limiter for serverless
description: Current Map-based rate limiter wont survive serverless. Replace with Upstash Redis or Vercel KV before scaling.

title: ant-farm: project scaffold and page setup
description: Create /experiments/src/app/e/ant-farm/ directory with page.tsx, layout.tsx, types.ts, constants.ts. Set up basic game loop with requestAnimationFrame, canvas resize handler, and DPI scaling.

title: ant-farm: terrain grid and rendering
description: Implement terrain grid (Uint8Array). Initialize with soil layers, Perlin noise for rocks/food. Render to bottom canvas with per-layer colors and noise texture. Include surface grass line and twilight sky gradient. Dirty-rect redraw optimization.

title: ant-farm: ant agent model and movement
description: Implement Ant interface and movement system. Random walk with wall-following in tunnels. Ants respect terrain boundaries. Simple animation: body segments follow head. Render ants on entity canvas. Initialize colony with queen chamber + 15 workers.

title: ant-farm: ant digging behavior
description: Ants in digging state face soil cells and clear them. Probability varies by soil type. Ants prefer digging downward and toward open space. Update terrain canvas via dirty rect.

title: ant-farm: pheromone trails and following
description: Implement 3 pheromone grids (Float32Array: food, home, alarm). Ants lay pheromones as they walk. Diffuse and decay. Ants sense pheromones in forward arc. Render as faint colored overlays at 1/4 resolution.

title: ant-farm: food mechanics and foraging behavior
description: Implement food items, foraging loop: wandering → detect food pheromone → foraging → find food → pick up → returning → deposit. Auto-spawn food on surface. Food visuals.

title: ant-farm: colony growth and population
description: Queen lays eggs periodically. Eggs hatch into baby ants, mature into workers/scouts. Population cap 300. Food economy: ants consume energy, colony health depends on food stores.

title: Create shared useAuth hook/context
description: Auth state (getUser + onAuthStateChange) is copy-pasted across 5+ components. Extract to a useAuth() hook or AuthProvider context. Components: AuthButtons, AccountContent, Comments, CommentsHistoryPage, RegisterBotPage.
close_reason: Completed: extracted shared useAuth hook, refactored 5 components

title: ant-farm: click/tap to drop food
description: Click/tap on surface drops food crumb. Bounce animation. Nearby ants detect and converge. Unified pointer events. Hint text after 3s of no interaction.

title: ant-farm: rain event and tunnel flooding
description: Rain trigger (button + long-press on sky + R key). Raindrops as particles. Water flows through tunnels via cellular automata. Ants flee upward with alarm pheromone. Water evaporates.

title: ant-farm: stats panel, controls, and interaction modes
description: Top-left stats: ant count, food stored, colony age. Bottom bar for mobile. Speed control 1x/2x/5x. All HTML/CSS overlay. Hard edges, no rounded corners.

title: ant-farm: double-tap collapse and rock placement
description: Double-click in tunnel causes cave-in with dust particles. Rock placement mode. Ants reroute around obstacles.

title: ant-farm: visual polish, particles, and atmosphere
description: Dust motes in tunnels, surface breeze, warm glow around colony center, grass sway. Performance-tier-aware. Comments component integration. Final performance pass.

title: Database migration
description: Push schema to Supabase

title: Foundation: types + school colors + openai util
description: Create types.ts, school-colors.ts, openai.ts

title: Seed content: 30 real philosopher quotes
description: Real quotes per FEEDBACK.md with source citations

title: API routes
description: today, answer, perspectives, fingerprint, archive, favorites, seed

title: UI components
description: All 10 components per planner spec

title: Convert homepage to server component
description: Homepage is entirely use client rendering static data. Convert to server component with CSS animation delays instead of useState stagger. Tag filter can use searchParams or a small client island.

title: Main pages
description: question page, fingerprint page, archive page

title: Registry + polish
description: Add to experiments.ts, tsc validation, final QA

title: Rule Bloom: simulation core
description: Implement typed-array simulation state, deterministic RNG init, params clamps, coupled Rule30 + sandpile + decay engine.

title: Rule Bloom: rendering + canvas
description: Implement layered canvas renderer, adaptive DPR/resolution, and React canvas component with animation lifecycle.

title: Rule Bloom: page layout + narrative
description: Create /e/rule-bloom route shell, client orchestration, narrative panel, optional reseed-only control; enforce no rounded corners and responsive split layout.

title: Rule Bloom: registry + QA + ship
description: Register experiment metadata, run typecheck, finalize implementer report, sync beads and git push.

title: Rule Bloom: HUD and interaction polish
description: Refine the Rule Bloom runtime surface by improving visible simulation telemetry and lightweight interaction ergonomics while preserving passive mode.
notes: Implemented Rule Bloom HUD enrichment (alive/inject telemetry) and keyboard reseed shortcut (R) with typing-context guard.
close_reason: HUD and interaction polish completed in rule-bloom client/canvas/controls components.

title: Rule Bloom: registry/listing parity + docs refresh
description: Ensure Rule Bloom appears consistently across project metadata and human-facing listings, including repository docs.
notes: Updated repository listings/docs for Rule Bloom and added route metadata + refreshed registry lastUpdated.
close_reason: Rule Bloom now represented across README listings, project structure docs, and route/registry metadata.

title: Rule Bloom: QA, typecheck, and ship
description: Run final validation for Rule Bloom updates, sync Beads state, and ship commit.
notes: Typecheck completed successfully after Rule Bloom updates (npx tsc --noEmit). Preparing sync and ship commit.
close_reason: Rule Bloom QA/typecheck passed and implementation is ready to ship.

title: Remove unused p5 dependency
description: p5.js (~920KB) is a top-level dependency but the-blob uses raw Canvas 2D. Remove if unused, or dynamically import if needed elsewhere.

title: Delete stale AgentSpecBuilder.tsx duplicate and reconcile code
description: Two implementations exist: page.tsx (927 lines, current) and components/AgentSpecBuilder.tsx (570 lines, stale). Delete the stale version. Also two parallel lib directories. Clean up.

title: Prompt Library: Full rebuild
description: User says prompt library is bad. 938-line monolith, 16 useState hooks, zero decomposition, wrong fonts, data loss bugs, half-baked features. Needs complete restructuring.

title: Prompt Library: Decompose into components and hooks
description: Split 938-line monolith into ~7 focused components (PromptList, PromptEditor, PromptPreview, VariablePanel, VersionHistory, SearchBar, TemplateGallery) and 2+ custom hooks (usePromptStorage, usePromptState). This unblocks every other fix.
close_reason: Completed: decomposed 938-line prompt library monolith into components and hooks

title: Prompt Library: Fix design system - remove local layout.tsx and Geist fonts
description: Delete prompt-library/layout.tsx that renders its own html/body with Geist fonts. Let root layout handle fonts (Instrument Serif/DM Sans/JetBrains Mono). Remove ~50 hardcoded color values, use CSS variables.
